name: sardis-demo-video
description: YC Demo Video for Sardis - Safe Spending Infrastructure for AI Agents

scripts.build: remotion render src/index.tsx SardisYCDemo out/sardis-yc-demo.mp4 --codec h264
scripts.render:preview: remotion render src/index.tsx SardisYCDemo out/sardis-yc-demo-preview.mp4 --codec h264 --scale 0.5
